column5: Does anybody have any personal experience with with reels.  I just picked 1 up and they seem pretty solid.  Specs are  - 7BB + 1rb - External adjustable centrifugal cast control system - Aluminum frame - Graphite side plates  For the price they seems pretty good.  I am used to shimano chronarch as I have a fleet of them, I just wanted to try something different and this caught my eye today
